refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort an array using a case insensitive "natural order" algorithm

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function implements a sort algorithm that orders alphanumeric strings in the way a human being would while maintaining key/value associations. This is described as a "natural ordering".
natcasesort is a case insensitive version of natsort.
See also sort, natsort, strnatcmp, and strnatcasecmp.
